# UISplitViewController.Style.tripleColumn

**Case**

The split view interface displays three columns.

## Declaration

```swift
case tripleColumn
```

## Constants

- **UISplitViewController.Style.unspecified**: The split view interface uses the classic split view style.
- **UISplitViewController.Style.doubleColumn**: The split view interface displays two columns.

items.description: The split view interface uses the classic split view style.
